rules.natural: If the restaurant has authorization to receive the food shipment, then food is delivered to the restaurant.
If the vehicle has valid transport authorization, then either the food shipment has emergency approval or, should the food shipment pass lab testing, the food shipment meets safety standards.
If a delivery truck has a scheduled delivery event, then the delivery truck has a confirmed delivery event.
If a delivery truck has a confirmed delivery event, then the restaurant has authorization to receive the food shipment.
If the food shipment passes inspection, then the restaurant has authorization to receive the food shipment.
If the food shipment meets safety standards, then the food shipment does not have contamination.
Either the food shipment passes lab testing or the food shipment passes visual inspection.
If the food shipment passes visual inspection, then the food shipment meets safety standards.
If the food supplier meets requirements, then the vehicle has valid transport authorization.
Either the food supplier meets requirements or the food distributor meets requirements.
If the food distributor meets requirements, then either the food shipment has emergency approval or, should the food shipment pass lab testing, the food shipment meets safety standards.
If food is not delivered to the restaurant, then the food shipment has contamination.

facts.natural: A delivery truck has a scheduled delivery event.
The food shipment does not have emergency approval.

target.natural: Food is delivered to the restaurant.

(A1 → G).natural: If the restaurant has authorization to receive the food shipment, then food is delivered to the restaurant.

(A10 → (A7 ∨ (A5 → A4))).natural: If the vehicle has valid transport authorization, then either the food shipment has emergency approval or, should the food shipment pass lab testing, the food shipment meets safety standards.

(A11 → A1).natural: If a delivery truck has a scheduled delivery event, then the restaurant has authorization to receive the food shipment.

(A12 → A1).natural: If a delivery truck has a confirmed delivery event, then the restaurant has authorization to receive the food shipment.

(A2 → A1).natural: If the food shipment passes inspection, then the restaurant has authorization to receive the food shipment.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: If the food shipment meets safety standards, then the food shipment does not have contamination.

(A5 → A4).natural: If the food shipment passes lab testing, then the food shipment meets safety standards.

(A5 ∨ A6).natural: Either the food shipment passes lab testing or the food shipment passes visual inspection.

(A6 → A4).natural: If the food shipment passes visual inspection, then the food shipment meets safety standards.

(A7 ∨ (A5 → A4)).natural: Either the food shipment has emergency approval or, should the food shipment pass lab testing, the food shipment meets safety standards.

(A8 → (A7 ∨ (A5 → A4))).natural: If the food supplier meets requirements, then either the food shipment has emergency approval or, should the food shipment pass lab testing, the food shipment meets safety standards.

(A8 → A10).natural: If the food supplier meets requirements, then the vehicle has valid transport authorization.

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: Either the food supplier meets requirements or the food distributor meets requirements.

(A9 → (A7 ∨ (A5 → A4))).natural: If the food distributor meets requirements, then either the food shipment has emergency approval or, should the food shipment pass lab testing, the food shipment meets safety standards.

(¬G → A3).natural: If food is not delivered to the restaurant, then the food shipment has contamination.
